characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a yellow taxi, bus driver
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road with multiple lanes. A black sedan is seen merging from the right side lane into the self-vehicles lane. A yellow taxi is visible ahead in the left lane. The bus on the right side is stationary.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while the black sedan merges into its lane from the right side. The vehicle keeps a safe distance from the merging sedan and the yellow taxi ahead.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black sedan, approximately 2 meters away, merging into the self-vehicles lane. 2) Left side: A yellow taxi, approximately 10 meters away, driving ahead in the left lane.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road with trees lining both sides. A silver sedan is consistently ahead of the self-driving vehicle. The road is relatively clear with moderate traffic. The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and distance from the silver sedan ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and follows the silver sedan ahead, keeping a safe distance. The vehicle does not change lanes or make any sudden movements, indicating a steady driving pattern.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed and direction.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a yellow car, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a tree-lined road. A white sedan is parked on the left side of the road. A yellow car is moving ahead in the left lane, and a black car is moving ahead in the right lane. The black car is gradually moving closer to the self-vehicles lane, indicating a potential cut-in behavior.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while monitoring the black car on the right side, which is gradually moving closer to the self-vehicles lane. The vehicle is prepared to decelerate if the black car cuts in.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 2) Front-left: A yellow car, approximately 15 meters away, moving forward in the left lane. 3) Front-right: A black car, approximately 12 meters away, moving forward and gradually approaching the self-vehicles lane.
